name: Castle Blast (Special Edition)
description:
This was a special copy of the game Castle Blast that was awarded in the Castle Blast Label Contest.

It differs from the regular version in the following ways:
  • The winner's initials and a serial number are displayed on the top of the screen when * is pressed.
  • The winner's initials and a serial number are displayed as a moving message at the bottom of the screen when the game is over.
  • There is a cheat mode so the player can begin at any level.
